name: Power League II
overview: Taking the formula of the previous game, the player picks a team from a selection of ten fictional baseball teams, selects which member is the pitcher, then controls the pitcher during a strike session, and the fielders while the ball flies. There are five modes in the game: • Versus Mode has two players facing each other in one game. • Open Mode is similar to Versus, but playing against the computer instead of a human player. • Pennant Mode takes the player to the baseball tournament, facing and challenging opposing teams, one after another. • All Star Mode enables the player to pick players for a team based on performance in a single game. • Home Run Mode allows the player to have a go at batting and score a run. The player is also free to edit the All Star team members in any order and change their names.
